Episodes.Title: Episode 1
Episodes.Plot: Katie keeps her affair with a patient secret. Lawyer Sioghan is tired of trying to become pregnant by her husband, and is instead interested in a work colleague.

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: After spending a passion-filled night together, Alex suggests she may cancel the wedding, but Jessica's reaction forces her to keep her plans. Episodes.Title: Episode 4
